name: Stench
flavor_text: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.

name: Drizzle
flavor_text: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

name: Speed Boost
flavor_text: Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.

name: Battle Armor
flavor_text: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

name: Sturdy
flavor_text: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.

name: Damp
flavor_text: Prevents the use of explosive moves such as [[moves:Self-Destruct]] by dampening its surroundings.

name: Limber
flavor_text: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.

name: Sand Veil
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasion in a sandstorm.

name: Static
flavor_text: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.

name: Volt Absorb
flavor_text: Restores HP if hit by an [[types:Electric]]-type move, instead of taking damage.

name: Water Absorb
flavor_text: Restores HP if hit by a [[types:Water]]-type move, instead of taking damage.

name: Oblivious
flavor_text: The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.

name: Cloud Nine
flavor_text: Eliminates the effects of weather.

name: Compound Eyes
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s compound eyes boost its accuracy.

name: Insomnia
flavor_text: The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.

name: Color Change
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s type becomes the type of the move used on it.

name: Immunity
flavor_text: The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.

name: Flash Fire
flavor_text: Powers up the Pokémon’s [[types:Fire]]-type moves if it’s hit by one.

name: Shield Dust
flavor_text: This Pokémon’s dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.

name: Own Tempo
flavor_text: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.

name: Suction Cups
flavor_text: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.

name: Intimidate
flavor_text: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.

name: Shadow Tag
flavor_text: This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon’s shadow to prevent it from escaping.

name: Rough Skin
flavor_text: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.

name: Wonder Guard
flavor_text: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.

name: Levitate
flavor_text: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all [[types:Ground]]-type moves.

name: Effect Spore
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.

name: Synchronize
flavor_text: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokémon.

name: Clear Body
flavor_text: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

name: Natural Cure
flavor_text: All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.

name: Lightning Rod
flavor_text: The Pokémon draws in all [[types:Electric]]-type moves.  Instead of being hit by [[types:Electric]]-type moves,  it boosts its Sp. Atk.

name: Serene Grace
flavor_text: Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring  when attacking.

name: Swift Swim
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.

name: Chlorophyll
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

name: Illuminate
flavor_text: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.

name: Trace
flavor_text: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.

name: Huge Power
flavor_text: Doubles the Pokémon’s Attack stat.

name: Poison Point
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

name: Inner Focus
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.

name: Magma Armor
flavor_text: The Pokémon is covered with hot magma, which prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

name: Water Veil
flavor_text: The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

name: Magnet Pull
flavor_text: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.

name: Soundproof
flavor_text: Soundproofing of the Pokémon itself gives full  immunity to all sound-based moves.

name: Rain Dish
flavor_text: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

name: Sand Stream
flavor_text: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

name: Pressure
flavor_text: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.

name: Thick Fat
flavor_text: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from [[types:Fire]]- and [[types:Ice]]-type moves.

name: Early Bird
flavor_text: The Pokémon awakens twice as fast as other Pokémon from sleep.

name: Flame Body
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

name: Run Away
flavor_text: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

name: Keen Eye
flavor_text: Keen eyes prevent other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon’s accuracy.

name: Hyper Cutter
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.

name: Pickup
flavor_text: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

name: Truant
flavor_text: The Pokémon can’t use a move the following turn if it uses one.

name: Hustle
flavor_text: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

name: Cute Charm
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

name: Plus
flavor_text: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the [[abilities:Plus]] or [[abilities:Minus]] Ability is also in battle.

name: Minus
flavor_text: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the [[abilities:Plus]] or [[abilities:Minus]] Ability is also in battle.

name: Forecast
flavor_text: The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to [[types:Water]], [[types:Fire]], or [[types:Ice]].

name: Sticky Hold
flavor_text: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

name: Shed Skin
flavor_text: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

name: Guts
flavor_text: It’s so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat.

name: Marvel Scale
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.

name: Liquid Ooze
flavor_text: Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.

name: Overgrow
flavor_text: Powers up [[types:Grass]]-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Blaze
flavor_text: Powers up [[types:Fire]]-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Torrent
flavor_text: Powers up [[types:Water]]-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Swarm
flavor_text: Powers up [[types:Bug]]-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

name: Rock Head
flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

name: Drought
flavor_text: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Arena Trap
flavor_text: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing.

name: Vital Spirit
flavor_text: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.

name: White Smoke
flavor_text: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

name: Pure Power
flavor_text: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.

name: Shell Armor
flavor_text: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

name: Air Lock
flavor_text: Eliminates the effects of weather.

name: Tangled Feet
flavor_text: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

name: Motor Drive
flavor_text: Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an [[types:Electric]]-type move, instead of taking damage.

name: Rivalry
flavor_text: Becomes competitive and deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but deals less to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

name: Steadfast
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.

name: Snow Cloak
flavor_text: Boosts evasion in a hailstorm.

name: Gluttony
flavor_text: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.

name: Anger Point
flavor_text: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.

name: Unburden
flavor_text: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon’s held item is  used or lost.

name: Heatproof
flavor_text: The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from [[types:Fire]]-type moves that hit it.

name: Simple
flavor_text: The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.

name: Dry Skin
flavor_text: Restores HP in rain or when hit by [[types:Water]]-type moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases the damage received from [[types:Fire]]-type moves.

name: Download
flavor_text: Compares an opposing Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever will be more effective.

name: Iron Fist
flavor_text: Powers up punching moves.

name: Poison Heal
flavor_text: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned, instead of losing HP.

name: Adaptability
flavor_text: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

name: Skill Link
flavor_text: Maximizes the number of times multi-strike moves hit.

name: Hydration
flavor_text: Heals status conditions if it’s raining.

name: Solar Power
flavor_text: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight, but HP decreases every turn.

name: Quick Feet
flavor_text: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

name: Normalize
flavor_text: All the Pokémon’s moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Sniper
flavor_text: Powers up moves if they become critical hits when attacking.

name: Magic Guard
flavor_text: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

name: No Guard
flavor_text: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

name: Stall
flavor_text: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

name: Technician
flavor_text: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.

name: Leaf Guard
flavor_text: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

name: Klutz
flavor_text: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.

name: Mold Breaker
flavor_text: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: Super Luck
flavor_text: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.

name: Aftermath
flavor_text: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.

name: Anticipation
flavor_text: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon’s dangerous moves.

name: Forewarn
flavor_text: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.

name: Unaware
flavor_text: When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon’s stat changes.

name: Tinted Lens
flavor_text: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.

name: Filter
flavor_text: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

name: Slow Start
flavor_text: For five turns, the Pokémon’s Attack and Speed stats are halved.

name: Scrappy
flavor_text: The Pokémon can hit [[types:Ghost]]-type Pokémon with [[types:Normal]]- and [[types:Fighting]]-type moves.

name: Storm Drain
flavor_text: Draws in all [[types:Water]]-type moves. Instead of being hit  by [[types:Water]]-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.

name: Ice Body
flavor_text: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

name: Solid Rock
flavor_text: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

name: Snow Warning
flavor_text: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.

name: Honey Gather
flavor_text: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.

name: Frisk
flavor_text: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.

name: Reckless
flavor_text: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

name: Multitype
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the Plate or Z-Crystal it holds.

name: Flower Gift
flavor_text: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself and allies in harsh sunlight.

name: Bad Dreams
flavor_text: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.

name: Pickpocket
flavor_text: Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.

name: Sheer Force
flavor_text: Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.

name: Contrary
flavor_text: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

name: Unnerve
flavor_text: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

name: Defiant
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.

name: Defeatist
flavor_text: Halves the Pokémon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.

name: Cursed Body
flavor_text: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

name: Healer
flavor_text: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.

name: Friend Guard
flavor_text: Reduces damage done to allies.

name: Weak Armor
flavor_text: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.

name: Heavy Metal
flavor_text: Doubles the Pokémon’s weight.

name: Light Metal
flavor_text: Halves the Pokémon’s weight.

name: Multiscale
flavor_text: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes when its HP is full.

name: Toxic Boost
flavor_text: Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.

name: Flare Boost
flavor_text: Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is burned.

name: Harvest
flavor_text: May create another Berry after one is used.

name: Telepathy
flavor_text: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.

name: Moody
flavor_text: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.

name: Overcoat
flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.

name: Poison Touch
flavor_text: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

name: Regenerator
flavor_text: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

name: Big Pecks
flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.

name: Sand Rush
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a sandstorm.

name: Wonder Skin
flavor_text: Makes status moves more likely to miss.

name: Analytic
flavor_text: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

name: Illusion
flavor_text: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in the party’s last spot.

name: Imposter
flavor_text: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it’s facing.

name: Infiltrator
flavor_text: Passes through the opposing Pokémon’s barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.

name: Mummy
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.

name: Moxie
flavor_text: The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.

name: Justified
flavor_text: Being hit by a [[types:Dark]]-type move boosts the Attack stat of the Pokémon, for justice.

name: Rattled
flavor_text: [[types:Dark]]-, [[types:Ghost]]-, and [[types:Bug]]-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.

name: Magic Bounce
flavor_text: Reflects status moves, instead of getting hit by them.

name: Sap Sipper
flavor_text: Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a [[types:Grass]]-type move, instead of taking damage.

name: Prankster
flavor_text: Gives priority to a status move.

name: Sand Force
flavor_text: Boosts the power of [[types:Rock]]-, [[types:Ground]]-, and [[types:Steel]]-type moves in a sandstorm.

name: Iron Barbs
flavor_text: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with iron barbs.

name: Zen Mode
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon’s shape when HP is half or less.

name: Victory Star
flavor_text: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

name: Turboblaze
flavor_text: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: Teravolt
flavor_text: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: Aroma Veil
flavor_text: Protects itself and its allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

name: Flower Veil
flavor_text: Ally [[types:Grass]]-type Pokémon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

name: Cheek Pouch
flavor_text: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

name: Protean
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.

name: Fur Coat
flavor_text: Halves the damage from physical moves.

name: Magician
flavor_text: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

name: Bulletproof
flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

name: Competitive
flavor_text: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.

name: Strong Jaw
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.

name: Refrigerate
flavor_text: [[types:Normal]]-type moves become [[types:Ice]]-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Sweet Veil
flavor_text: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

name: Stance Change
flavor_text: The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move, and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King’s Shield.

name: Gale Wings
flavor_text: Gives priority to [[types:Flying]]-type moves when the  Pokémon’s HP is full.

name: Mega Launcher
flavor_text: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

name: Grass Pelt
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat in [[moves:Grassy Terrain]].

name: Symbiosis
flavor_text: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.

name: Tough Claws
flavor_text: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

name: Pixilate
flavor_text: [[types:Normal]]-type moves become [[types:Fairy]]-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Gooey
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

name: Aerilate
flavor_text: [[types:Normal]]-type moves become [[types:Flying]]-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Parental Bond
flavor_text: Parent and child each attacks.

name: Dark Aura
flavor_text: Powers up each Pokémon’s [[types:Dark]]-type moves.

name: Fairy Aura
flavor_text: Powers up each Pokémon’s [[types:Fairy]]-type moves.

name: Aura Break
flavor_text: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.

name: Primordial Sea
flavor_text: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify [[types:Fire]]-type attacks.

name: Desolate Land
flavor_text: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify [[types:Water]]-type attacks.

name: Delta Stream
flavor_text: The Pokémon changes the weather to eliminate all of the [[types:Flying]] type’s weaknesses.

name: Stamina
flavor_text: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

name: Wimp Out
flavor_text: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

name: Emergency Exit
flavor_text: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

name: Water Compaction
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat sharply when hit by a [[types:Water]]-type move.

name: Merciless
flavor_text: The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

name: Shields Down
flavor_text: When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokémon’s shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

name: Stakeout
flavor_text: Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s replacement if the target switches out.

name: Water Bubble
flavor_text: Lowers the power of [[types:Fire]]-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

name: Steelworker
flavor_text: Powers up [[types:Steel]]-type moves.

name: Berserk
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat when it takes a  hit that causes its HP to become half or less.

name: Slush Rush
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.

name: Long Reach
flavor_text: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

name: Liquid Voice
flavor_text: All sound-based moves become [[types:Water]]-type moves.

name: Triage
flavor_text: Gives priority to a healing move.

name: Galvanize
flavor_text: [[types:Normal]]-type moves become [[types:Electric]]-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Surge Surfer
flavor_text: Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat on [[moves:Electric Terrain]].

name: Schooling
flavor_text: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.

name: Disguise
flavor_text: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

name: Battle Bond
flavor_text: Defeating an opposing Pokémon strengthens the Pokémon’s bond with its Trainer, and it becomes Ash-Greninja. [[moves:Water Shuriken]] gets more powerful.

name: Power Construct
flavor_text: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.

name: Corrosion
flavor_text: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a [[types:Steel]] or [[types:Poison]] type.

name: Comatose
flavor_text: It’s always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.

name: Queenly Majesty
flavor_text: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

name: Innards Out
flavor_text: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.

name: Dancer
flavor_text: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.

name: Battery
flavor_text: Powers up ally Pokémon’s special moves.

name: Fluffy
flavor_text: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of [[types:Fire]]-type moves.

name: Dazzling
flavor_text: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

name: Soul-Heart
flavor_text: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.

name: Tangling Hair
flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

name: Receiver
flavor_text: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

name: Power of Alchemy
flavor_text: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

name: Beast Boost
flavor_text: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

name: RKS System
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.

name: Electric Surge
flavor_text: Turns the ground into [[moves:Electric Terrain]] when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Psychic Surge
flavor_text: Turns the ground into [[moves:Psychic Terrain]] when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Misty Surge
flavor_text: Turns the ground into [[moves:Misty Terrain]] when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Grassy Surge
flavor_text: Turns the ground into [[moves:Grassy Terrain]] when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Full Metal Body
flavor_text: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

name: Shadow Shield
flavor_text: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

name: Prism Armor
flavor_text: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

name: Neuroforce
flavor_text: Powers up moves that are super effective.

name: Intrepid Sword
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Dauntless Shield
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Libero
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.

name: Ball Fetch
flavor_text: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.

name: Cotton Down
flavor_text: When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stat of all Pokémon except itself.

name: Propeller Tail
flavor_text: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

name: Mirror Armor
flavor_text: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

name: Gulp Missile
flavor_text: When the Pokémon uses [[moves:Surf]] or [[moves:Dive]], it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.

name: Stalwart
flavor_text: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

name: Steam Engine
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a [[types:Fire]]- or [[types:Water]]-type move.

name: Punk Rock
flavor_text: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

name: Sand Spit
flavor_text: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.

name: Ice Scales
flavor_text: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

name: Ripen
flavor_text: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

name: Ice Face
flavor_text: The Pokémon's ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon's appearance. The ice will be restored when it hails.

name: Power Spot
flavor_text: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

name: Mimicry
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.

name: Screen Cleaner
flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of [[moves:Light Screen]], [[moves:Reflect]], and [[moves:Aurora Veil]] are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.

name: Steely Spirit
flavor_text: Powers up ally Pokémon's [[types:Steel]]-type moves.

name: Perish Body
flavor_text: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

name: Wandering Spirit
flavor_text: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

name: Gorilla Tactics
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

name: Neutralizing Gas
flavor_text: If the Pokémon with Neutralizing Gas is in the battle, the effects of all Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

name: Pastel Veil
flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from being poisoned.

name: Hunger Switch
flavor_text: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of each turn.

name: quick-draw
flavor_text: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

name: Curious Medicine
flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

name: Unseen Fist
flavor_text: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

name: Transistor
flavor_text: Powers up [[types:Electric-type]] moves.

name: Dragon’s Maw
flavor_text: Powers up Dragon-type moves.

name: Chilling Neigh
flavor_text: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

name: Grim Neigh
flavor_text: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

name: As One
flavor_text: This Ability combines the effects of both [[pokemon:Calyrex]]'s [[abilities:Unnerve]] Ability and [[pokemon:Glastrier]]'s [[abilities:Chilling Neigh]] Ability.

name: As One
flavor_text: This Ability combines the effects of both [[pokemon:Calyrex]]'s [[abilites:Unnerve]] Ability and [[pokemon:Spectrier]]'s [[abilities:Grim Neigh]]  Ability.
